hero.title: Welcome to Our AI-Powered Golf Swing Analysis Study!
hero.description: Thank you for your interest in participating in our research conducted at the FAU Machine Learning and Data Analytics Lab in Erlangen. We will record your golf swings using high-definition cameras and a Vicon motion tracking system to collect precise data for advanced AI analysis.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The session will last approximately 2-3 hours.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: Body markers are non-invasive and designed for comfort. They can be placed on the skin or on suitable clothing.

marker.title: 1. Marker Placement
marker.description: IR-Reflective Body Markers will be placed on key joints and segments of the body. They can be placed on the skin or on suitable (tight fitting) clothing.

swing.title: 2. Swing Recording
swing.description: You will perform a series of golf swings, allowing us to capture your motion and aid the development of our AI coaching research.

analysis.title: 3. Data Analysis
analysis.description: Your data will enable us to analyze and compare marker-based and markerless pose estimation algorithms, assessing their accuracy for AI-driven golf coaching systems.

who.title: Who can participate?
who.description: We are looking for right-handed golfers of all skill levels to participate in our study.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Since we want to release the dataset, we need permission to use the data. Your data will only be used for research purposes. Ask us if you want to know more.

incentive.title: Incentive
incentive.description: As a thank-you, every participant will get a comprehensive Trackman Combine report with distance-specific swing analysis, plus detailed video data to help break down their swing.

location.heading: Where is the Study taking place?
location.labName: FAU Machine Learning and Data Analytics Lab
location.parking: Easy parking available right in front of the entrance.

questions.question: What is Vicon?
questions.answer: Vicon is a high-precision, marker-based motion capture system that provides 'ground truth' data for our analysis.

questions.question: What kind of data are you collecting?
questions.answer: We are capturing your swing motion to aid the development of our AI coaching research. Your data will enable us to analyze and compare marker-based and markerless pose estimation algorithms.

questions.question: Who is running this study?
questions.answer: This study is conducted by the FAU Machine Learning and Data Analytics Lab in Erlangen.

questions.question: What should I bring to the session?
questions.answer: Please wear comfortable, form-fitting athletic clothing (like compression shorts/leggings and a tight-fitting shirt) to ensure accurate data capture.

questions.question: I have a question, who can I contact?
questions.answer: If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out via sebastian.hoefler@fau.de.
